Uses of Class
Boxes.CBox

  • Packages that use CBox 
    Package Description
    Boxes
    Provides classes for defining the various box operators used by formatter components for text formatting.
    Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree
    Provides classes and an interface implementing AST2BoxTree component.
    Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream
    Classes and an interface implementing BoxTree2Stream component.
    Components.Abstract.PanelTree
    Classes and an interface implementing a PanelTreeView component.
    Components.Formatter
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a Formatter (AST2Text) component.
    Patterns
    Classes implementing the structural representation of pattern specifications.

    • Uses of CBox in Boxes

      Subclasses of CBox in Boxes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CArgDataBox
      Creates a box operator used in patterns to distinguish data elements.
      class  CArgNodeBox
      Creates a box operator used in patterns to distinguish subtrees.
      class  CFlowListBox
      A box operator which formats boxes horizontally until no more boxes fit on the same line (i.e., uses multiple lines).
      class  CHorBox
      A box operator for horizontal formatting of boxes.
      class  CHorSepListBox
      A box operator for horizontal formatting of boxes with a separator.
      class  CIndBox
      An indentation box operator.
      class  CSelBox
      Specifies a selectable box.
      class  CTermBox
      Formats a terminal symbol without data.
      class  CTermDataBox
      Formats a terminal symbol with data.
      class  CVerBox
      A box operator for vertical formatting of boxes.
      class  CVerSepListBox
      A box operator for vertical formatting of boxes with a separator.
